sn42.13:3.5: ca vahātuṁ → tāni ca pahātuṁ (sya-all, km); tāni vahātuṁ (pts1ed); tāni ca yātuṁ (katthaci); tāni cāvahātuṁ (?)
sn42.13:9.5: pasayha ratanaṁ ahāsi → pasayha adinnaṁ ādiyati (sya-all); pasayha adinnaṁ ratanaṁ ādiyi (mr)
sn42.13:23.5: yvāhaṁ → yohaṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed) | kiñci → kañci (?)
sn42.13:23.6: Ubhayamettha → ubhayattha me (?) | upapajjissāmī’ti → upapajjīssāmīti (pts1ed); paraṁ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
sn42.13:25.10: sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjissāmī’ti → paraṁ maraṇā na upapajjissāmīti (?)
